Welcome to gulls documentation!

The gulls simulator is a powerfull tool for generating gravitational microlensing events. gulls simulates large numbers of individual microlensing events involving source and lens stars that are drawn from star catalogs produced by a population synthesis Galactic model. For a complete background on gulls simulator please read (Penny et al. 2013) and (Penny et al. 2019).
